title: MarketWatch: Antitrust and Tech
description: Apple faces antitrust heat from app developers, the courts and Congress. Why is everyone targeting the world's most valuable company, and what could it do to its business? MarketWatch San Francisco Bureau Chief Jeremy Owens is joined by Nabiha Syed, free-speech lawyer and president of The Markup, to discuss this topic.
